A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Saw this movie - wished I hadn't.  Do not see this dross. Written by clueless agenda driven hacks. Totally ignores what went before and invites you to believe in hollow pointless characters. 

Zero story or character development and reinvents old characters in such a manner as to portray them as guileless miscreants.  New characters are vaguely introduced and imbued with tremendous gravitas that requires all viewers to disengage their brains in order to accept these characters. 

Finally any review encouraging repeat viewings is an obvious ploy by Disney employees and accolytes attempting to bolster ticket sales. 

China hated it for good reason - it's crap. They didn't reject TFA or Jumanji or ROGUE one but this detritus was pulled from cinemas after 1 week. PULLED from cinemas in China after flopping miserably. 

Stay away.
